content: Yes, Ta Karamanlidika Tou Fani has outdoor seating, so you can enjoy the warm Athens weather while trying different types of cheese and enjoying their famous souvlaki. The outdoor seating area is a cozy and charming spot, perfect for people-watching while enjoying your meal. You can also choose to sit inside and enjoy the rustic decor and cozy ambiance of the deli. Whatever you choose, you're sure to have a memorable dining experience at Ta Karamanlidika Tou Fani.
